description:
Make a Jigsaw puzzle! But first you'll have to find your pieces.
Connect the pieces to unlock more. Goal: solve the puzzle of course!

v0.0.1.description:

Place the apworld in custom_worlds, generate, and play!
Play here -> https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/

v0.0.3.description:
Updates:
- Game
-- Play sound when you receive an item
-- Automatically save and load placement of pieces

- Apworld
-- Can now generate up to 250 pieces, generation is faster
-- Added option group for pieces ("Pieces")

Apworld for Jigsaw by Spineraks!
Double click the apworld (or place it in custom_worlds), generate, and play!
Play here -> https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
v0.0.3.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.0.3

v0.0.4.description:
Updates:
- items are now just called "Puzzle Piece" and there is a fixed order you receive them in
- UP TO 1000 PIECES (bad idea)
- option group for pieces

- new default image
- option to start with corner and edge pieces
- option to add more pieces into the pool than needed
- option to have more checks available than in logic
- show logic and possible merges in-game

Apworld for Jigsaw by Spineraks!
Double click the apworld (or place it in custom_worlds), generate, and play!
Play here -> https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
v0.0.4.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.0.4

v0.1.0.description:
Newest version of Jigsaw for Archipelago. Games generated with the previous version should work fine with this website.

Changes since last release:
- renamed item-group
- changed save data (so that multiple slots won't share the same save data)
- added "straight" edges (the previous "straight" edges is now called diagonal)
- support for Universal Tracker (although it's not necessary anymore with the ingame tracker)
v0.1.0.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.1.0

v0.1.1.description: Honestly there's no reason to use this one :)
v0.1.1.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.1.1

v0.10.0.description:
# Version 0.10.0
A new version thanks to the amazing work of @djfariel <3
- **_Huge media upgrade_**: GIF support, camera input (including OBS Studio virtual camera), and live YouTube/Twitch browser capture — your puzzle can now be almost anything.
- Major engine overhaul: New accelerated WebGL-style renderer, support for up to 2500 pieces, smoother performance, smarter aspect-ratio scaling, and a precision drop-location handle.
- Expanded controls & cosmetics: Deep zoom/pan options plus a fully upgraded visual customization panel for board look, rendering, scaling, and more.
- See the changelog in-game for all changes.

### Apworld
- Not many changes (same yaml), just some extra explanation and added **fariel** to the list of authors.
v0.10.0.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.10.0

v0.2.0.description:
New release for Jigsaw for AP! Play on https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
You will be directed to a backup version for older games, so no worries, your previous games are fine!

**Apworld changes:**
Several new YAML options. Good to know: you might now receive several pieces at once.
- Disable adding filler items to the item pool.
- Input % of merges that will give you a check. Will lead to less items/locations from your game in the multiworld.
- Ability to add extra pieces to the pool so you goal earlier and not *all* pieces need to be found.
- Give in order of piece types you receive (for example first corner&edge pieces). You can also tweak how strictly this rule is followed.
- Give in order of pieces you receive. For example: random order, every piece fits somewhere, almost no piece fits anywhere. You can also tweak this.

**Game changes:**
- If you make your game window bigger or smaller, the pieces will remain in their correct position.
- Image quality of your puzzle is increased.
- Several checks to see if you are not overwriting your save with the wrong progress.
- Added preview image and text client to the game. Click on them to make them bigger or smaller.

Much more is planned, join the discord for details :3
v0.2.0.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.2.0

v0.3.0.description:
New release for Jigsaw for AP! Get the apworld and yaml here and play on https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
(if you are curious about the game or want to help, see this repository: https://github.com/spinerak/JigsawAP)
You will be directed to a backup version for older games, so no worries, your previous games are fine!

**Apworld changes:**
Several new YAML options.
- Default maximum number of checks is now set to 100 per puzzle. More would affect games quite a bit. You can still change it of course!
- You will now get one of 16 images by default and you can even select in the yaml which one you want. Check the default images here: https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/images.html. You can still select your own image.
- Several bug-fixes

**Game changes:**
- Your save is now stored in data storage, which means it is not stored locally anymore, so save files won't get lost anymore!
- **Co-op**: you can play puzzles together, you'll see progress of each other, and you can even see pieces moving in real time!
- Several other bug-fixes

Additional changes:
- "a": added options (size of puzzle / border / shadow).

Much more is planned, join the discord for details :3
v0.3.0.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.3.0

v0.4.0.description:
New release for Jigsaw for AP! Get the apworld and yaml here and play on https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
(if you are curious about the game or want to help, see this repository: https://github.com/spinerak/JigsawAP)
0.3.0 games still work on the website.

**Apworld changes:**
- Every merge will now be a check, and the current options allow you to change the number of checks/items *in the pool*. Checks not "in the pool" will become new local filler items. The `allow_filler_items` options is gone and doesn't do anything anymore. 
- You can now play puzzles up to 2000 pieces. And more importantly: you can also go as low as 4 pieces!!
- Gigantic optimizations by Mysteryem make all `generate_early` complete well within a second.
- Items are now spread more carefully through the locations.
- All items will give the same number of pieces and it can be any number from 1 to 500 depending on the settings.
- More default images, we have 39 now!

**Game changes:**
- Since 0.3.0 the game has gotten many QOL updates with zooming, text client, preview, and performance. Also a lot of bug-fixes with the save files.
v0.4.0.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:

v0.4.1.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.4.1

v0.5.0.description:
New release for Jigsaw for AP! Get the apworld and yaml here and play on https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
(if you are curious about the game or want to help, see this repository: https://github.com/spinerak/JigsawAP)
Older games still work on the website.

**Apworld changes:**
I've changed some options around, you will need to make a new yaml.
- there are now forced local filler items so get a check every merge.
- you now put in the maximum number of "real checks" (not forced local filler) you want, and the minimum number of pieces per check you get.
- you can also disable local filler items if hosts are really concerned about the number of checks (even though disabling it changes only the number of checks and nothing else).
- the number of extra check is now a permillage (like percentage but 1/1000) of the number of pieces
- you now get the same number of puzzle pieces per item. I'll see if I can change that back

**Other changes**
- I fixed the notification "you're using a different aspect ratio" and it should only appear when you actually do.
- If you have archipelago and the jigsaw apworld installed, you can click on your slot on the website, and you will automatically be sent to the game with the hostport and name prefilled. Very quick!
v0.5.0.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.5.0

v0.6.0r2.description:
New release for Jigsaw for AP! Get the apworld and yaml here and play on https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
(if you are curious about the game or want to help, see this repository: https://github.com/spinerak/JigsawAP)
Older games still work on the website.

**Changes:**
- **Rotations! You can enable them in the yaml.**
- Other options: disable the clue button and adjust the size of the image.
- Controls: right click moves the screen, mousewheel rotates when a piece is moved and otherwise zooms. R also rotates the piece being moved. Mobile: while dragging a piece, tap the screen with a second body part to rotate the piece.
- Extra zoom level.
v0.6.0r2.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.6.0

v0.6.1.description:
New release for Jigsaw for AP! Get the apworld and yaml here and play on https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
(if you are curious about the game or want to help, see this repository: https://github.com/spinerak/JigsawAP)
Older games still work on the website.

**Changes:**
- Added ????? (read the yaml (second-to-last option), or don't, it's a nice surprise and on by default 😄 )
- Renamed `enable_forced_local_filler_items` to `placement_of_fillers` and added option to shuffle fillers into item pool
- Added spacebar to rotate and remember size of preview/textclient per slot
- Added option to get pieces in four parts but not rotate the quadrants
v0.6.1.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.6.1

v0.6.2.description:

Older games still work on the website.

**Changes: (from 0.6.0 to 0.6.2)**
- Added fake pieces, just use your existing yaml and you'll see :)
- Added "chaos" piece type
- Renamed `enable_forced_local_filler_items` to `placement_of_fillers` and added option to shuffle fillers into item pool. But old yamls still work.
- Added spacebar to rotate and remember size of preview/textclient per slot
- Added option to get pieces in four parts but not rotate the quadrants

New release for Jigsaw for AP! Get the apworld and yaml here and play on https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/

v0.8.0.description:
New release for Jigsaw for AP! Get the apworld and yaml here and play on https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
(if you are curious about the game or want to help, see this repository: https://github.com/spinerak/JigsawAP)
Older games still work on the website.

**Changes: (from 0.7.2 to 0.8.0)**
- You can now select hexagon puzzle pieces which plays quite differently, please check it out!
- You can also choose to have only one row/column of pieces, they'll be very long (this started as a meme and it probably still is)...
v0.8.0.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.8.0: Hexagon Update!

v0.9.0.description:
New release for Jigsaw for AP! 👻 Get the apworld and yaml here and play on https://jigsaw-ap.netlify.app/
(if you are curious about the game or want to help, see this repository: https://github.com/spinerak/JigsawAP)
Older games still work on the website.

**Changes: (from 0.8.0 to 0.9.0)**
- ⚠️ New yaml options and clean-up, you will have to create a new yaml ⚠️ 
- Proper rotation support for hexagon: 60 degrees and 120 degrees.
- Option to create "uniform piece size"; pieces have equal width and height so when you rotate no way is clearly wrong.
- Added piece type to yaml (but still adjustable in-game)
- Add manifest so game works on AP0.7.0+
- Several fixes
v0.9.0.title: Jigsaw for AP 0.9.0: Spooky Rotations
